title: Christmas Spirit Essential Oil Blend | Young Living Essential Oils
description: Young Living Christmas Spirit essential oil is a comforting blend of orange, cinnamon and spruce. Enjoy the holidays with this pleasant scent. Order now!
cleaned_text: Christmas Spirit is a beautiful medley of three oils reminiscent of winter holidays: Orange essential oil has a bright aroma that is believed to bring joy, peace, and happiness to those who possess it. Cinnamon Bark essential oil is the oil of wealth from the Orient. Black Spruce essential oil has an aromatic influence that brings a feeling of balance and grounding. Topical: Dilute 1 drop with 4 drops of V-6 Vegetable Oil Complex. Test on small area of skin on the underside of arm and apply to desired area as needed. Aromatic: Diffuse up to 30 minutes 3 times daily. Has an uplifting, invigorating, and joyful aroma Evokes memories of joy, happiness, comfort, and security Has an aroma that is reminiscent of winter holidays Perfect to use during holiday gatherings Fabulous to gift to friends Diffuse 8-20 drops in your home diffuser for a burst of Christmas cheer. Diffuse 8-20 drops to rekindle warm, loving holiday memories. Use Christmas Spirit to create your own holiday potpourri. Add it to Thieves® Household Cleaner for a festive twist to your cleaning experience. Dilute it with V-6 and apply topically to take the feeling of Christmas with you everywhere. Add it to dryer balls to infuse a subtle holiday scent into your clothing and linens. Add Christmas Spirit to a spray bottle and use it as a natural air freshener. Monoterpenes, Limonene, Sesquiterpenes Possible skin sensitivity. If pregnant or under a doctor's care, consult your physician prior to use. Dilution recommended for topical use. Keep away from eyes and mucous membranes. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid using on infants and very small children. Avoid direct sunlight or UV rays for up to 12 hours after applying product.
